name: Power Lines
description:
During a heavy storm, one of the power lines malfunctioned. You play as Alex who is an electrician who is called to fix the power line. As you try to fix it strange things start to happen. 

Is it real? Is it a hallucination? Is it a dream? 

If you like my work you can support me here: https://ko-fi.com/tarnepgames

Thank you.
